attributes.action: respond to the previous two petitions regarding sanctions agaist Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Brown. Why is it that you have completely ignored the two previous petitions here: 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Israel-Sanctions/
and here: 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Arms-embargo/
We, the British feel very strongly against the indiscriminate bombing of innocent Palestinian men, women and children. This is evident by the amount of signatures collected by these two petitions. Why have you chosen to completely ignore us on this issue?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
